column1: “Change will not come if we wait for some other person
column2: or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.”

column2: you will fill the world with hope
column3: you will fill yourself with hope.”

column1: “I'm inspired by the people I meet in my travels--hearing their stories
column3: their fundamental optimism and decency. I'm inspired by the love people have for their children. And I'm inspired by my own children
column4: how full they make my heart. They make me want to work to make the world a little bit better. And they make me want to be a better man.”

column1: “Sometimes it takes a while to recognize that someone has a special ability to get us to believe in ourselves
column2: to tie that belief to our highest ideals
column3: and to imagine that together we can do great things.In those rare moments
column4: when such a person comes along

column1: “Making your mark on the world is hard. If it were easy
column2: everybody would do it. But it's not. It takes patience
column4: and it comes with plenty of failure along the way. The real test is not whether you avoid this failure
column5: because you won't. it's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction
column6: or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.”
